content: CPF Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 13 Mar 2019What is the latest update to the CPF Lifetime Retirement Investment Scheme (LRIS)? Does anyone have any experience with it?1 answerAnswerBump0

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 13 Mar 2019No updates yet. CPFIS is still here for the time being. LRIS is supposed to either complement or replace it totally. But now with the recent sales charge deferment, LRIS might be pushed back a little as well. All assumptions for now.0 comments0
